casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Wesley Patterson No. 413P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Patterson, Wesley. James R. Glover, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill. Alesia Mikhaulauna Balshakova, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 7th of November 2016 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
